level.heading: Spanish translations of District publications relating to health, safety and welfare.
Legislative History of Laws
level.text: Law 2-31 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-116, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 12, 1977 and July 26, 1977, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 16, 1977, it was assigned Act No. 2-77 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 2-31, see Mayor's Order 86-67, May 2, 1986.
